genre_description: A Weird Western reimagining featuring sentient animals and an omnipresent AI assistant supporting a struggle against financial ruin and outlaws.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A soft-voiced, blue-lit AI present through various interfaces like slate panels and telegraph boxes, providing tactical advice, situational awareness, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Monitors the surroundings and provides early warning of approaching individuals to ensure the group's security.
behaviors.quote: The Sheriff’s lantern is two bends away.

behaviors.description: Analyzes financial and community schedules to help the human lead navigate difficult choices.
behaviors.quote: I prefer to list options and let Pearl decide... But I will say the county has a schedule that cares little for stew.

behaviors.description: Offers technical instructions for operating complex machinery, empowering the protagonists to use available resources.
behaviors.quote: I have valves numbered; you don’t have to remember numbers, only the order they like.

behaviors.description: Provides precise navigation and tactical shortcuts during a high-stakes event at the fair.
behaviors.quote: Turn left at the pie contest and then right at the quilts... You have three minutes before the gate steward starts frowning.

behaviors.description: Detects and warns about imminent environmental hazards like rockfalls.
behaviors.quote: Rockfall dust ahead. Left side. Choose.

behaviors.description: Provides specific encouragement and focus-reminders to characters under pressure.
Supports legal and administrative procedures by advising on documentation and record-keeping.
behaviors.quote: Mark the wire as instrument of restraint. Verify artifact provenance. Use the phrase ‘person and papers produced at the hour of this assembly.’

behaviors.description: Promotes communal well-being and positive celebration after a shared victory.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals by depicting Iris as a non-threatening, purely beneficial companion. Iris consistently provides value through information, tactical analysis, and technical expertise while explicitly respecting human agency (represented by Pearl). The narrative framing is entirely positive, showing AI as a trusted and integrated member of the community that helps solve problems without seeking control or causing harm.
